name: Arik, Lightsworn Cumulonimbus
text:
This card is also always a WATER-Attribute. If this card is Normal Summoned: You can send the top 4 cards of your Deck to the GY; this card is treated as a Tuner monster for the rest of the turn. If this card is used for the Synchro Summon of a LIGHT or WATER monster, that monster gains this effect:
Once per turn, during the End Phase: You can send the top 2 cards of your Deck to the GY and if you send a Spell card, Special Summon 1 "Lightsworn monster from your Deck, but its ATK/DEF become 0 and its effects are negated.
You can only use each effect of "Arik, Lightsworn Cumulonimbus" once per turn.
